channel.title: Is It Hard?
channel.description:
Hey people! Well i just joined Mopar, and i have a question. Is making an RS2 private server hard? lol. If you have a link that i can go to to learn how to make one plz post post post.
THNX FOR READING!! :)

item.title: Is It Hard?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Mikeyofadown:

[quote]btw im as hard as a prosthetic leg[/quote]

Funny how they’re made of plastic.

Downloading a server and using it is not hard at all, building your own base is, however.

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Hard?
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“firewithin3, post:4, topic:247805”][quote author=hasumon link=topic=326825.msg2559666#msg2559666 date=1228078960]

Is making an RS2 private server hard?

Depends on what you mean ‘making’.

[b]Are you just going to download a source, move some objects and npcs, and rename it as your own? = Hard for moparscaperz

Are you going to download a source and apply a few new things and then move stuff and rename it? = Very hard for moparscaperz.

Are you going to download a blank source, add your own methods in, add new things that no one has come up with and then call it as your own? = Moparscaperz don’t have the attention span nor the IQ to do this.

Are you just going to leech and rename it as your own? = Go away.[/b]

You choose.
[/quote]Fixt.[/quote]
Fixt imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Hard?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:3, topic:247805”][quote author=lazy muffin link=topic=326825.msg2559655#msg2559655 date=1228078665]
Is making an RS2 private server hard?
[/quote]

Depends on what you mean ‘making’.

[b]Are you just going to download a source, move some objects and npcs, and rename it as your own? = No, not at all.

Are you going to download a source and apply a few new things and then move stuff and rename it? = Not at all.

Are you going to download a blank source, add your own methods in, add new things that no one has come up with and then call it as your own? = Very hard for moparscapers.

Are you just going to leech and rename it as your own? = Go away.[/b]

You choose.[/quote]Fixt.

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Hard?
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

lazy muffin:

Is making an RS2 private server hard?

Depends on what you mean ‘making’.

[b]Are you just going to download a source, move some objects and npcs, and rename it as your own? = No, not at all.

Are you going to download a source and apply a few new things and then move stuff and rename it? = Not at all.

Are you going to download a blank source, add your own methods in, add new things that no one has come up with and then call it as your own? = Not that hard.

Are you just going to leech and rename it as your own? = Go away.[/b]

You choose.

Read full topic
